Interface ec.meta.Method

public interface interface Method
This is the approved replacement interface for java.lang.reflect.Method. Note that it has no "invoke"--invocation in the ec.meta model happens on Objs.

descriptor()
Get the descriptor of this Method.
getReturnType()
Get the return type for this method.

descriptor 
 public abstract MethodDescriptor.  descriptor()
Get the descriptor of this Method.

Returns:
the descriptor
getReturnType 
 public abstract Cla getReturnType()
Get the return type for this method.

Returns:
the return type
